description:
Olivia is http://anidb.net/ch94634 [Hanako]`s and http://anidb.net/ch94635 [Kasumi]`s classmate who feigns her foreign ethnicity by pretending to be an American transfer student despite having only been born and raised in Japan with foreign parents. Thus, she pretends to speak in broken Japanese to keep her image while gradually getting better to solidify her act.
Source: Wikipedia
name: Olivia
